DOC.brief_title: Follow-up Ovarian Function Young Women Who Underwent Ovarian Cortex Cryopreservation
DOC.detailed_description: Between 1997 december 2013 , 546 girl woman underwent ovarian cortex cryopreservation investigator ' institution fertility preservation . The main indication need gonadotoxic treatment , repeat ovarian surgery genetic risk premature ovarian failure . These woman send questionnaire concern ovarian function since procedure questionnaire satisfaction concern procedure . Six different questionnaire use adapt patient 's initial indication cryopreservation patient 's age time cryopreservation . Complementary data obtain medical file analysis contact patient 's family doctor gynecologist . Data correlate received gonadotoxic treatment surgical intervention . The purpose study improve indication patient selection ovarian cortex cryopreservation .
DOC.criteria: woman underwent ovarian cortex cryopreservation institution 1997 2013 deceased woman cohort
